init.description: Initialize nx-project-release in your workspace with interactive configuration

reset-config.description: Remove all nx-project-release configuration from the workspace

setup-commitlint.description: Set up commitlint with Nx scopes validation

setup-workflows.description: Configure CI/CD workflows for automated releases

configure-release.description: Add or update release configuration for a specific project

exclude-projects.description: Manage which projects are excluded from versioning and releases

configure-version.description: Configure version settings for one or multiple projects

configure-changelog.description: Configure changelog settings for one or multiple projects

configure-global.description: Configure global nx-project-release settings in nx.json

configure-release-groups.description: Create or update release groups configuration with pattern matching

configure-artifact.description: Configure artifact creation for one or multiple projects

configure-publish.description: Configure publish targets for projects with global registry settings
